ygData.subject: Old memories die hard.
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine approached the Ark, it was still in multiple pieces, mostly scattered on the ground. He remembered the scanners and wondered if they d recognize him.

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lunarpine approached the Ark, it was still in multiple pieces, mostly
scattered on the ground. He remembered the scanners and wondered if they'd
recognize him. The scanners clicked, beeped and the door slid open, he may
have had a new body but Veratis had used the same DNA scans from his old
body. Sounds echoed through the halls which made it sound as if the ship was
speaking to him. he heard Ramulus explaining something and decided to see
what his associate was up to.. It sounded like preperation for a battle,
maybe Lunarpine would get the chance to test out his new body after all.
